method.name: getServices
method.description: Returns the services configured in this instance of Entando.

parameter.description: The tag (or part thereof) of the services to return.
Filters the services based on compatibility with MyEntando. Entries true or false

method.name: getService
method.description: Returns one of the services configured in this instance of Entando.

parameter.description: The unique key of the wanted service.
